features: 【Tall Nightstand with Drawers】This black bedside table includes an open shelf in the middle and a top wooden desktop, providing ample space for storage and display. The open top shelf is perfect for placing decorations. Drawers with handles provide more space to store the personal items you want to put in.

【Upgraded Fabric Drawer】This end table with storage shelf features 3 easy-to-pull arched handles and a storage drawer made of high-quality non-woven fabric to increase your storage space. The fabric drawer is lightweight, breathable, and dustproof. The fabric drawer has an engineered wood veneer on the front, presenting a rustic style and giving your room a more design feel.

【Wide Applicability】 This black side table features a double shelf design. The wooden top is sturdy and wear-resistant. It can display vases, photo frames, lamps, decorations, etc. It can also be used to place printers, alarm clocks, books, and other debris, making it very artistic as a decoration.

【Sturdy and Durable】The height of this night stands for bedrooms is 29.7 inches. Four solid square pipes provide a solid frame for the small side table, which can bear 70 pounds overall, with a top and middle wood load of 20 pounds. It can also be used as a multi-functional office poem printer, bedside table, living room side table, and so on.

【Easy Installation and High-Quality Service】The manual contains detailed operating instructions, including hardware and tools. Each accessory is labeled for easy installation. Each dresser nightstand undergoes a strict quality inspection before being sent out. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via email.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We like them, but wonder how long the fabric drawers will last
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were clear, so assembly was fine. The metal frame and two 'wood' shelves are sturdy and attractive and should last. The fabric drawers are working fine; we do wonder, though, how long those will last... Overall we like these, at least so far while new. They look good and function well. They are tall (which we like) but relatively small in surface area (which is OK for us).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble. We would give it an 8 or 9 for ease of constructing.The materials are well made. It does not look like junk as some lightweight cheaper furniture often is. We needed a table that would fit perfectly next to my father's bathroom sink at the Senior Living Retirement home, because his apartment bathroom has small spaces and virtually no storage or counter top to place his regular items like dentures and toothbrush, etcThe two flat shelves plus two drawers were exactly what was needed! The imitation woodgrain and colors of brown are very visually attractive as well. Overall, a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful easy to install
reviews.reviewText: I’ve seen some reviews where people have mentioned difficulty with tools. I’m not sure why as all the tools needed are there- except for a screwdriver. Screwdrivers are pretty common tools that are usually purchased and kept so that’s probably why it is not provided as I see some people complaining about that. All the rest of the tools are there. You only need the screwdriver to install the handlebars on the fabric drawers.It’s freaking beautiful. The fabric drawers (usually don’t like) have a nice wood-looking design on it so I really like it. The only issue I had was one of the drawers holes didn’t line up with the handlebar, so will be reaching out about that. Everything else perfect. Looks just how I wanted it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice tall nightstand
reviews.reviewText: This is east to assemble, looks nice, would make a great AirBnB item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Throwing it in the trash.
reviews.reviewText: At first glance it looks simple enough to put together. And it would be had they provided the necessary tools. The directions list specified tools included within the kit, except they don’t fit the hardware. I came to stop on the second step because there is no way to turn the assigned screw into place. I’m unfamiliar with the shape of the head but nothing in this kit turns the screw(s). I’m not unskilled when it comes to putting things of this sort together. I have nothing in my arsenal of mix and match tools that fit either. It was a waste of time and I’m really disappointed. Already tossed out the box so I guess I’m gonna toss out the rest as well.Edit: I purchased my own screws to assemble. I stand by the fact that the tools and materials provided are rubbish.AND, this is a product review and in no way reflects the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dorm
reviews.reviewText: Wasn't the easiest to assemble but not the most difficult by far. I put it together alone. I figured out not to tighten the screws one at a time but just enough to hold until I got them all aligned and started, then tighten all one by one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Holes for the handles in the drawers were often uneven. Quite hard to work around. Otherwise good drawers

reviews.reviewTitle: if i need bed side tables again i will buy them again
reviews.reviewText: love the tables they fit perfectly in our space

Originally bought with low expectations, I just needed a nightstand that matched my other furniture and wouldn’t break the bank. I was pleasantly surprised at how nice it looks and how sturdy it is. It took about 30 minutes to put together and was not very difficult to put together.Very happy with this nightstand and I have a whole drawer that I could use for space. It makes my room look so much cleaner having the drawer space.

reviews.reviewTitle: I like the black color but.....
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it looks very nice steady nice fit in my room. Easy to assemble just an advice do not open all packages at once follow instructions one at a time otherwise you will loose order.But the cubs drawers are very hard to slide and very tight while opening. for that reason I am looking for more wood than fabrics. So I will return it.
It's a nice nightstand. Illustrated instructions made it very to assemble. The fabric drawers are sturdy enough to make them very useful. Good quality for the money.
